title: Scenic Coastal Fukuoka Retreat with Open-Air Onsen Access
description:
Sink into serenity with a stay at the elegant Mercure Fukuoka Munakata Resort & Spa, perfectly positioned on the scenic coastline of Fukuoka. Nestled near the breathtaking Satsuki Matsubara pine grove and Munakata’s peaceful beaches, the Mercure Fukuoka is a breath of fresh air amid Japan’s non-stop city living.

Unwind with crisp and comfortable accommodations, flavourful dining overlooking the dazzling Sea of Genkai and thoughtful drinks at the Onsen Lounge, then step into the soothing hot springs for a true onsen experience.
offer_address: Munakata City, 1303 Tano, Munakata, Fukuoka, 811-3514, Japan
